title: Serious Ranked Team (Eventually become Known)
body:
Bio/Info:  Hey there everyone, my name is Isaac and I'm 18. I have an undying passion for League of Legends (so much so that i have dropped out of school to play more). I'm currently diamond 5 and main Top/Jg/Mid. I'm looking for people who are serious about league and are keen to make a rank team that will eventually become known (possibly enter tournaments down the road etc). We'll have scheduled times for when we game (for consistency sake) and possibly have a few subs to fill in if people can't make it during certain times. 

The Available roles at the moment are:
Adc
Support
Mid
Top
Jungle
(however i will be playing either Top/Jg/Mid it just depends on the situation)

Please fill out the following questions so i may draft you into the team.

Ign:
Bio:
Able to use voice chat (skype etc):
Rank: 
Main roles:
How often can you play league:
Sub roles:
Worst role:

My Ign in Satria, feel free to add me and ask any questions you like.

Best of luck on the fields of justice summoners.

replies.body:
Hey, I currently have a high plat/diamond team that needs a top laner if you are looking to join. Our team is pretty much what you are looking for in terms of seriousness, however if you flame please dont bother bro :)

IGN: Swagganomics

Ign: Rynn

Bio: 17 New Zealand

Able to use voice chat (skype etc): Can use whatever freeware is available, have TS and Skype downloaded

Rank: Diamond 5

Main roles: Top and Support

How often can you play league:  Can play any day from 3:15pm - 12am (This is increased on weekends)

Sub roles: Mid 

Worst role: Jungle and ADC 

I will be free of school in about 40 days time and will have a greatly increased flexibility of practice

Ign: Bee sting
Bio: 22, Queensland
Able to use voice chat (skype etc): Skype
Rank: d5
Main roles: Top/jg  
How often can you play league: everyday pretty much
Sub roles: mid/adc
Worst role: sup
Make sure you add me on League and message me on what role it is you'd like to play <3

Ign: ZeroZephyr
Bio: Im 16, I also quit school because of league :D its actually my dream to play on stage just like the pros so yea im willing to go pro and work with u guys :)
Able to use voice chat (skype etc): Yes.
Rank: SIlver 1
Main roles: ADC
How often can you play league: Everyday
Sub roles: MID/Support/Jungle
Worst role: TOP

Ign: XSirCution

Bio: 18, Love League of Legends, Non toxic, Positive Attitude, Really looking forward to play professionally with a team!

Able to use voice chat (skype etc): Yes, got a good mic and headphones

Rank: Plat 4 ( Diamond 5 Last Season )

Main Roles: Jungle, Support

How often can you play League: Every night except for Mondays

Sub Roles: Very comfortable in every role

Worst Role: ADC

Ign: Safehouse

Bio: I am 23, I have played league for a very long time, played on multiple teams and love to follow the pro scene.

Able to use voice chat (skype etc): Yes I pretty much have them all

Rank: Diamond 5

Main roles: Mid

How often can you play league: I play everyday

Sub roles: I can play everything but I am a mid laner.

Worst role: ADC

Hey Isaac. Im Isaac too!! Haha

Ign: Giliy

Im 19 attending uni for 3D animation in Auckland NZ.

I can use whatever voice chat. Pref skype

Rank Diamond 5.

Main mid then jg/sup.

{{champion:268}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:112}} 
I play league every day in the afternoon and evening.

Sub role i guess top but pref sup or jg in that case.

Worst role is Adc.

Im also prety decent at shot calling.

I also have a friend on D4 who is a  very good Adc and he would be keen for a team.
His ign: Garlic aioli

Good luck finding people i hope we can play soon.
Giliy

Ign: Essembie
Bio: I am a meat popsicle
Able to use voice chat (skype etc): no - wake the baby
Rank: only when I am home alone
Main roles: Hamlet in the toongabbie amateur theatre's production of .. hamlet.
How often can you play league: too often
Sub roles: prefer wholemeal but sometimes get honey oat.
Worst role: yes, preferably with onion and mustard and eaten in munich.

Ign: Zebra
Bio: 20 from NZ
Able to use voice chat (skype etc): Yes
Rank: Diamond 5
Main roles: Jung / Mid / Sup
How often can you play league: up to ~11pm NZ time, prob later just wake up at 6 so want some sleep.
Sub roles: Jung / Mid / Sup / Top
Worst role: AD
